iti39:4.1: “Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa dve dhammadesanā pariyāyena bhavanti.
iti39:4.5: ‘pāpaṃ pāpakato disvā tattha nibbindatha virajjatha vimuccathā’ti—
iti39:4.7: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa imā dve dhammadesanā pariyāyena bhavantī”ti.
iti39:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
